name: Sales Order Management
description:
Overview

The ARIS Process Mining Enterprise demo SALES ORDER MANAGEMENT has been retired, because it was mainly built to focus on ARIS Process Performance Manager (ARIS PPM), the predecessor of ARIS Process Mining.


We want to offer our customers a promote future-proof ARIS Process Mining. So, please make use of the following demos below:

  • ARIS Process Mining demos integrated in ARIS
  • ARIS Process Mining SaaS-only demos​​​​​

meta.supportedAppBuilder: Application Builder v1.2.6, Application Builder v1.2.7, Application Builder v1.2.8
meta.postInstallationMsg: This demo uses browser based simulator(s) for business Data. Data will be available in about 2-10 Minutes after navigating to Asset Tracking Application
